attributes.action: Child benefit is for Children.  Not Adults.
attributes.additional_details:
Don't remove Child Benefit.

"I am a 5 year old child and I don't see why I should get my money taken away from me.  I don't make any money and so should not lose my Child Benefit.

My Daddy says that all the money I get from Child Benefit is for me and not him.  It is unfair that the government is taking away what is currently being used for my education and well-being."

Stop targeting the children who will be the next leaders, business men & women, or health providers of the future.
